name: WERM - An Existential Adventure
description:
• You are an existential worm.
  • Use A and D to move.
  • Press space to scream (silently).
  • You can play forever, but what’s the point?

Inspired by r/showerthoughts and the pain of existence.

Game is cut off if not fullscreen.

Made with @m11

LD48: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/$248707
